statements: UPDATE global_education_trends SET trend_description = 'Rising Enrollment Numbers' WHERE country = 'USA';

UPDATE global_education_trends SET trend_description = 'Improving STEM Education' WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2020;

UPDATE education_trends SET initiative_description = 'Updated description' WHERE country_code = 'USA' AND initiative_name = 'STEM Program';
UPDATE research_analysis SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', citation_count = 50 WHERE research_id = 101;
UPDATE education_trends SET initiative_description = 'Updated initiative description' WHERE country_code = 'USA' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE research_analysis SET citation_count = 50, publication_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' AND research_topic = 'Machine Learning';
UPDATE education_trends SET trend_description = 'Increased' WHERE country_code = 'US' AND year = 2022;
UPDATE research_analysis SET research_findings = 'Positive' WHERE analysis_id = 1;
UPDATE education_trends SET trend_description = 'Improving literacy rates' WHERE country_code = 'US' AND year = 2020;
UPDATE research_analysis SET research_findings = 'Significant correlation between parent involvement and student academic performance' WHERE analysis_name = 'Parent Involvement Study';
UPDATE education_trends SET trend_description = 'Rising technology adoption in schools' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE initiatives SET description = 'Promoting STEM education' WHERE initiative_name = 'STEM Boost';
UPDATE education_trends SET country='USA', trend_description='Advancing STEM Education', year=2022 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE research_projects SET researcher='Dr. Jane Doe', project_name='AI in Healthcare', end_year=2023, start_year=2020 WHERE id=2;

UPDATE research_projects SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE global_education_trends SET education_spending = 25000.67, literacy_rate = 85.3 WHERE country = 'United States' AND year = 2020;
UPDATE research_projects SET start_date = '2022-03-15', end_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE project_id = 101;
